entry.title: War Drives a Rift Between Two Ukrainian Brothers
entry.content: Russia and Ukraine have historical and cultural ties stretching back centuries, and some 20 million Ukrainians have relatives in Russia. Clashing experiences of the war have created gulfs between many of them.

entry.title: Kyiv Hit by Drone Attacks as Russia Targets Infrastructure
entry.content: Russia launched a fresh wave of Iranian-made drones to strike central Kyiv, Ukrainian officials said, as Moscow presses a campaign attacking Ukraineâ€™s energy infrastructure before the onset of winter.
